articles.description: Vitti shot to international fame in Michelangelo Antonioni’s drama L’Avventura in 1960
articles.content:
Italian actor Monica Vitti, an icon best known for her starring roles in films by Michelangelo Antonioni, has died aged 90, the countrys culture ministry said on Wednesday.
Goodbye Monica Vitti, goo… [+1584 chars]

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Dear Mr Joyce: an essay by Edna O’Brien - The Guardian
articles.description: As Ulysses turns 100, O’Brien tries to pin down what its extraordinary author was really like
articles.content:
BooksAs Ulysses turns 100, OBrien tries to pin down what its extraordinary author was really like
Was he garrulous? Did he wear a topcoat? Did he hanker after renown? Such questions we ask ourselves… [+8889 chars]

articles.title: Australian Survivor - S7 Ep. 3 - Network Ten - 10 News First
articles.description: A new day, a new Reward Challenge, with a trip to the coveted Survivor Shop. With one person from the winning Tribe able to take someone from the other Tribe along with them.
